title: AirTag helps Australian photographer recover over $7000 worth of stolen gear
content:
AirTag can be a simple and cost effective way to recover any lost or stolen items. One Australian man just found this out over the weekend as he searched for $7,000 worth of stolen photography gear. 

more…

The post AirTag helps Australian photographer recover over $7000 worth of stolen gear appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: An Australian photographer used AirTag to recover over $7,000 worth of gear taken from his car while traveling over the weekend.
